alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 11:30AM EDT until April 01 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richland County in north central Ohio... Ashland County in north central Ohio... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1129 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bloomville to near Bucyrus to 8 miles east of Morral, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Shelby, Ontario, Crestline, New London, Plymouth, Hayesville, Savannah, Polk, Sullivan, Lucas, Jeromesville, Bailey Lakes, Mifflin, Rowsburg, Nova, Mohicanville, Nankin and Shenandoah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph will continue even after the rain exits.
